text:
="preserve">George William Paul Pettit (November 29, 1931 – September 24, 2020) was an American professional baseball pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Pittsburgh Pirates in 1951 and 1953. Pettit was born in Los Angeles, California.
Pettit died on September 24, 2020 in Canyon Lake, California at the age of 88.
